channel.title: Help plz how do i have my friend join my server?
channel.description: hello, im wondering how to have my friend join my server..thank you[br][size=1]Posted on: January 14, 2007, 11:03:43 PM[/size][hr]helllllllo?[br][size=1]Posted on: January 14, 2007, 11:06:50 PM[/size][hr]how do i get another person online? it always says they are offline please help!!!!!!!!

item.title: Help plz how do i have my friend join my server?
item.dc:creator: @breaking_the_bridge breaking the bridge
item.description:
@breaking_the_bridge wrote:

You need a router, a no-ip adress for your server, and Hamachi if you want a Hamachi server. You also need a server base. Once you have done all of this, run your server and it will be able to let other people on.

Read full topic
item.source: Help plz how do i have my friend join my server?
